channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Darko -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Darko -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-45635|2024-06-04T09:16:47.382Z -- WP Darko -- Responsive Tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in WP Darko Responsive Tabs allows Code Injection.This issue affects Responsive Tabs: from n/a before 4.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-31928|2024-04-11T12:28:09.464Z -- WP Darko -- Top Bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Darko Top Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Top Bar: from n/a through 3.0.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-29797|2024-03-27T12:25:25.241Z -- WP Darko -- Grid Shortcodes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Darko Grid Shortcodes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Grid Shortcodes: from n/a through 1.1.
